videos.title: I will make ViVi Storm work or die trying
videos.description:
FINAL FANTASY has arrived on MTG Arena and we are playing Izzet Storm Combo to show off the power of ViVi Ornitier in Standard.

Worst Possible Merch http://www.coolstuffinc.com/cgb

MC Vegas BO1 Event: https://mcvegas.mtgfestivals.com/en-us/magic-play/ticketed-play-schedule.html?search=covertgoblue

videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: FINAL FANTASY x MTG Commander staring Cimo  Ashlizzlle  Taalia Vess  CGB
videos.description:
Worst Possible Merch Drop: 
https://www.coolstuffinc.com/cgb

Today's Commander battle features popular content creators   @Ashlizzlle @Cimoooooooo and  @Taalia_Vess and they get the worst possible CovertGoBlue experience!  Today's commanders are from Magic's newest set, FINAL FANTASY! They are Choco, Seeker of Paradise | Vivi Ornitier | Kafka, Court mage and Sephiroth, Fabled SOLDIER.  These are upgraded precons!
More Worst Possible Commander Show https://youtu.be/9F-RmDycKo0?si=Nqqo7uEEb7sMuRXQ

Decklists
